content.raw:
a couple of questions:

1. how would you add a mesh geometry to a visual later if we did not create the visual with this call (`CreateVisual("my_mesh", mesh)`)?

1. will there be an API to let you update the geometry contained in the visual? something like

        SetGeometry(index, newCone)

    or     

        visual->RemoveGeometry(index)
        visual->AddGeometry(newCone)
